google_reviews.author: Sandra Sowada
google_reviews.review: I met with Jackie and she explained the apartment application process in clear understandable language but also with warmth and clarity about the property and how living at Vintage might be for me. On the tour she showed me everything and every where, even the trash room (which was clean and freshly scrubbed). When we passed other residents they greeted each other and it was evident Jackie has a great relationship with them. The building is in excellent shape even taking in its age; No obvious wear and tear or deferred maintenance. I am looking forward to a future with my dog living at Vintage Bellingham.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Sandra for the 5 star review!  We look forward to having you be part of our community!

google_reviews.author: LER
google_reviews.review: Jackie, the Community Director, gave me a wonderful tour of the apartment amenities and property  this week.  She was very welcoming and informative . The property is very clean and well-maintained so I would feel safe living there. There are  also lots of fun activities to join in on.  Very good impression...

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Lynn,
Thank you so much for the 5 star review!  We look forward to seeing you soon!

google_reviews.author: Christine Bickel
google_reviews.review: The manager, Jackie, is great and made the application/move in process for my dad super easy! I'm so happy he'll be living at Vintage at Bellingham - the building is clean and well maintained, the grounds are beautiful, and it's convenient for his needs.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for the 5 Star review!  It is so nice to have your dad here.  If he needs anything, we are here for him!

google_reviews.author: Anne Steirer
google_reviews.review: Im grateful to live in my quiet, safe and clean building, thanks to the careful attention to details by Jackie, our marvelous, calm, caring and efficient Community Director. The experienced maintenance crew work to care for the indoors as well as the outdoor lawn, flowers and trees during every season. Friendly, interesting tenants daily enjoy a variety of active or quiet pursuits. Meet them at coffee hour, bingo, dominoes, card games, pool table, WII bowling, movies, books, puzzles and Seahawks pep rallies.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Anne,  Thank you so much for the 5 star review!  We do the best we can.  Thank you for being such a wonderful resident!

google_reviews.author: Barb Clark
google_reviews.review:
I moved in iNov
Absolutely love it
Everyone so friendly and Jackie (manage ) is wonderful!
I feel so safe and comfortable here!
Iy is so quiet
Lots of activites
The grounds and indoors are kept beautiful

Do wish had a little dog park
Are dog walking areas but wish could turn loose to run and play

ownerResponse.text: Thank you so much Barb!  We try very hard to make sure you and the rest of our residents are well taken care of.

google_reviews.author: Berneta Von Essen
google_reviews.review:
I love the care & respect that The Vintage gives me & all residents.
Maintenance is solved in a mannner of days but most likely same day.
I've never been in a place like this before!
THANK YOU!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for the 5 star review Berneta!  We do the best that we can and it wonderful to be appreciated!

google_reviews.author: Frank
google_reviews.review: The facility looked nice from the outside, but a completely undeserved rude reception this morning from the office manager was a turn off. Dour and unfriendly from the first words out of her lips, to potential new residents no less, is a key indicator of how they operate normally. Yes, we were let in by friendly residents after they saw us struggling to get an answer from the front call button first (which the manager bluntly admitted she didn't answer).   We live by the Golden Rule so were shocked at being treated so coldly for no reason.  We quickly left and found very friendly walk-in receptions at both Spring Creek and Affinity.   I don't normally post comments, but felt anyone looking here should be forewarned.

ownerResponse.text: I'm sorry that you felt that way.  We are a secure community for the benefits of our residents.  You followed people in and when I asked you about it, you misrepresented yourself and chose to leave rather than visiting with me.  We protect our residents and their privacy.  If you would like to set an appointment and visit further please call me at 360-715-0871. Thank you!

google_reviews.author: Charlyn Whitlock
google_reviews.review: I'm a new resident and the few times I have requested maintenance they have responded the same day and resolved the issue, which was minor each time. It's been an absolutely positive experience!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Charlyn!  We try very hard to make sure you and all of our residents are taken care of!  Welcome to the Vintage at Bellingham!

google_reviews.author: The Cats M
google_reviews.review:
I have been here for nearly 10 years.

Location of our apartment is nice and quiet. We have city bus service right out our front door.

Jackie our Manager and staff work hard to make sure we have a nice clean and safe place to live.

Senior living at its finest!

CathyM

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Cathy,
Thank you for the 5 Star Review!  We love having you and Owen as residents!  Please let us know if you need anything.

google_reviews.author: Kim Duff
google_reviews.review: My mother moved into the Vintage at Bellingham 4.5 years ago and it has been a blessing. There is a real family feel here and the community is so supportive and caring of each other. The apartments are very nice with multiple floor plans to choose from. The laundry and garbage are conveniently located on each floor. The grounds are beautiful and it's relaxing to sit on your balcony or in the gazebo by the flower garden and enjoy nature. Jackie the manager does an amazing job of organizing events for the residents and the Seahawks rallies are a favorite. She is helpful to the community in every way!! David the maintenance supervisor keeps the building in great working order. Jackie and David work so hard to make the Vintage at Bellingham a wonderful place to live. I would recommend it to anyone!

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Kim,
Thank you so much for the 5 Star Review!  We really appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with everyone.  Your mom is one in a million and loved by everyone!  It is always nice to see you when you come to visit.  If there is anything you need please let us know.  Take care, Jackie
